title: Differential blocking effects of Fe0 nanoplates on rice accumulation of typical essential and non-essential heavy metal elements in paddy fields
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00258J, Paper
Saiyong Zhu, Minjie Chen, Huiwang Dai, Saiqa Menhas, Jiang Xu, Daohui Lin
This study investigated how nanoscale zero-valent iron (nZVI) affects the transfer of essential and non-essential heavy metals (HMs) from soil to rice in two paddy fields with varying Cd, Cu,...
